title: Estate
description: The estate, the home of the Ancestor, is now overrun with brigands and eldritch horrors, conjured by the Ancestor in his pursuit of unknowable power, it is the mission of the Heir and Heiress, as well as the rest of the roster, to retake their birthrigth from its monstrous inhabitants.

title: Hamlet
description: The Hamlet is a small village, situated on the outskirts of the Estate. Its inhabitants suffered under the Ancestor's rule, and it now hosts the Heir and Heiress in their quest to reclaim the Estate.

title: The Old Road
description: Twisted and winding, the Old Road is the only path through the corrupted forest surrounding the Hamlet and the entire Estate. It is the only way to reach the Estate, and the only way to leave it.
